Blacklisted_Mod.message: We do not allow players to utilize modifications that grant an advantage over other players on our platform.

Spam.message: You are not allowed to engage in spamming or flooding chats on our platform.

Disrespect.message: Disrespecting players on our platform is not permitted.

Instigating.message: You are not allowed to make posts or discuss topics that may start drama on our platform.

Trolling.message: We do not allow trolling on our platform.

Advertisement.message: You are not allowed to redirect others to external platforms or servers on our platform.

Encouraging.message: You are not allowed to encourage others to break the rules on our platform.

Filter.message: You are not allowed to use words or phrases in place of other blocked words that bypass our filter system.

False_Info.message: Spreading false information on our platform is not allowed.

Chat_Bot.message: Using chat bots on our server is not permitted.

Under_13.message: Players must be at least 13 years old while using our platform. We do not accept appeals.

Harassment.message: Harassing other players/staff members on our server is not permitted.

Discrimination.message: We do not allow any discriminatory behavior on our platform.

Inappropriate.message: We do not allow behavior on our platform that is seen as inappropriate on our platform.

Predatory.message: Predatory behavior or explicit content, in any form, is not permitted on our servers.

Self_Harm.message: You are not allowed to encourage others to perform self harm on themselves on our platform.

Mute_Evasion.message: You are not allowed to use an alternative account to evade a mute on another account.

Ban_Evasion.message: You are not allowed to use an alternative account to evade a ban on another account.

Threats.message: You are not allowed to make any form of threats towards players on our platform.

Personal.message: Spreading personal information about yourself or others on our platform is not permitted.

Exploits.message: We do not allow players to use bugs or exploits on our platform.

Username.message: Your username violates our server rules. In order to play on our server, you must change your username and appeal.

Skin.message: Your skin violates our server rules. In order to play on our server, you must change your skin and appeal.

Abusing_Support.message: Abusing our support system or staff members is not permitted.

Staff_Imper.message: You are not allowed to impersonate members of our staff team on our platform.

Fraud.message: Your account has been suspended for fraudulent charges or chargeback payments. Please contact our support team for further information.

Other.message: Your account has been suspended from our platform. Please contact our support team for more information.
